title: Lewandowski Testimony, Iran & Gun Laws
itunes:title: Lewandowski Testimony, Iran & Gun Laws
description:
Kevin spoke with Marc Ross, founder of Caracal Global and Anna Edgerton, Bloomberg News Politics Editor. They discussed Iran, gun control, Sean Spicer on Dancing With The Stars, and testimony from former Trump aide Corey Lewandowski.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
